content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the command "get_hyperlinks" to gather information on river restoration techniques from a website, but received an HTTP 403 error. I then used the command "browse_website" to gather information on river restoration techniques from another website, and saved a summary of the information to a file called "river_restoration_summary.txt". I also wrote the same information to a file called "river_restoration_techniques.txt". I deleted a file called "new_file.txt" and created a new directory called "river_data" using the command "execute_shell". I attempted to create the "river_data" directory again, but received a message that it already exists. I appended the text "\\nI want to explore rivers in South America." to a file called "river.txt". I used the command "google" to search for information on river restoration techniques and received a list of relevant websites. I listed the contents of the "river_data" directory and found it to be empty. I attempted to download a file from a website using the command "execute_shell", but received a 404 Not Found error.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "git clone https://github.com/river_data.git"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"Cloning into \'river_data\'...\\nremote: Not Found\\nfatal: repository \'https://github.com/river_data.git/\' not found\\n"', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "river restoration techniques"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://www.engr.colostate.edu/~bbledsoe/CIVE413/Manual_of_River_Restoration_Techniques.htm", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stream_restoration", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration", "http://nwrm.eu/source/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://academic.oup.com/bioscience/article/60/3/209/257006", "https://www.gov.uk/flood-and-coastal-erosion-risk-management-research-reports/updating-the-river-restoration-centre-manual-of-restoration-techniques", "https://www.iowadnr.gov/Portals/idnr/uploads/RiverRestoration/toolbox/vegetative-restoration/Practice%202_Vegetative_Restoration_Full_Chapter.pdf"]', type='action_result')]
"""
